briefTitle: Tear Based Sample Collection Breast Cancer Detection
officialTitle: Tear Based Sample Collection for Breast Cancer Detection
conditions: Breast Cancer, Tear, Breast Cancer Female
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participant tear samples collected.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Individual is an adult woman and has recently been diagnosed with breast cancer.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Individual is excluded if they have already started treatment for the breast cancer diagnosis.
* Age less than 18 or more than 100 years.
